title: Manoharam Emerald Bead and Diamond Peacock Haaram - A Timeless Classic
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This exquisite haaram features a three-strand arrangement of meticulously strung emerald beads. The centerpiece boasts a captivating peacock (Mayura) motif, intricately designed with diamonds. Pear-shaped emerald drops add an elegant sway to the piece. The clasp is cleverly integrated within the peacock design. Filigree detailing enhances the overall sophistication.
colors: Vibrant green from the emerald beads and drops
complemented by the warm yellow of the gold and the dazzling brilliance of the white diamonds.
occasions: Diwali). A statement piece suitable for both traditional and contemporary celebrations.
description: This haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom. The combination of high-quality emerald beads, dazzling diamonds, and intricate peacock design embodies South Indian artistry. The durable 22K gold ensures longevity, while the design resonates with cultural significance, making it a cherished possession for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives the jewelry a rich luster, enhancing its regal appeal.
